introduction: Innovative Development with 7 years of experience, leveraging software engineering and information systems skills to deliver highly effective and creative solutions to business and technology challenges. I have good analytical and programming skills to develop IT and business solutions employing diversified technologies to increase productivity.Obtaining a challenging position as Frontend Developer, working with globally recognized organization, with expertise on mainly Frontend technologies.

timelineCards.description: Everyone is happy, because a Legend born
timelineCards.sideContent: I was born on 30th October, 1994 in a small family known as 'Rakshit Family' at Kolkata, West Bengal.

timelineCards.description: Entered into the vast world of knowledge.
timelineCards.sideContent: I completed my class 10th from B.E College Model School and my overall score was 83%.

timelineCards.description: As per indian parents false promise, entered into the so called Freedom.
timelineCards.shortDescription: Got a certificate of Final board examination.
timelineCards.sideContent: I completed high school (12th Board examination) from B.E College Model School and achieved overall score of 69%.

timelineCards.description: Phew! Finally got to know what is called freedom of life.
timelineCards.shortDescription: Graduation is completed from KIIT University and had a offer letter from 2 MNCs.
timelineCards.sideContent: I have done my Graduation from Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar. I completed my B.TECH with 7.40 CGPA. Also from campus drive, I got offer letter from 2 MNCs.

timelineCards.description: Started learning about a corporate life.
timelineCards.shortDescription: Joined as an Associate software enginner at Accenture, Pune.
timelineCards.sideContent: I started my carrier with Accenture. Initially I got a role in Software Testing. After 2 years I got promoted as a Software Enginner and got a role of Software Developer in Test, where I started learning frontend development and use Angular 6 for one year.

timelineCards.shortDescription: Joined as an Software enginner at Lowe's India, Bangalore.
timelineCards.sideContent: I switched my carrier and joined Lowe's India, tech hub of 2nd large Home Improvement retail chain in US. I joined as a software developer and here I mostly worked on frontend and a very few backend projects. I grow here as a Senior Frontend Developer and leading a team on frontend perspective. Here I gained expertise on React, Microfrontend, Redux and so on.
